op_master_id:
(SELECT
    kesn,
    dkei,
    dseq,
    sseq,
    CAST(CAST(dymd as CHAR(8)) AS DATE) as dymd,
    dcno,
    rbmn,
    rtor,
    rkmk,
    rtky,
    sbmn,
    stor,
    skmk,
    stky,
    valu,
    fway
FROM
    (SELECT
        h.dymd,
        h.dcno,
        z.*
    FROM zdata_h AS h
    JOIN zdata AS z ON
        h.kesn = z.kesn AND
        h.dseq = z.dseq AND
        h.dkei = z.dkei
    WHERE
        h.dymd = :DYMD AND
        z.delf = 0
    ) AS t
) AS tmp
